pillar.title: Culture, Wellbeing, History and Societal Impact
pillar.definition: Professional culture, OR politics, DEI, burnout, mental health, work-life architecture, pregnancy and parenting, historical evolution of the profession, public perception, misinformation, ethical identity, environmental impact of anesthesia.
inclusion_tests: Is this about how anesthesia is lived, experienced, perceived, or understood by society?
exclusion_tests: Formal research, clinical practice, economics, legal statutes, workforce deployment.
